name: Teensy Watch Games Pack6: 2-in-1
description:
Teensy watch games pack6 has following two games.

1.Word Craft
what’s the word? A fast-paced and dynamic word game designed for your Apple Watch. Quickly choose correct letters to complete the word.Complete as many words as you can.

2.Speed Dial
Can you dial numbers quickly on your apple watch?In this fast paced game you have to dial as many numbers as you can before time runs out.


Support and Feedback:

If you have any technical issue please contact us at teensystudios@gmail.com.
Please include the device information and if possible send a screenshot of the problem.
The more information that you provide to us, the better we can serve you and
fix the bugs that may exist.
